item.name: Create Accounting Settings
item.description:
UI-friendly map (keep JSON body without comments):
company -> Company
country_code -> Company Country Code

[Fiscal Localization]
fiscal_localization_country -> Fiscal Localization Country
account_fiscal_country -> Fiscal Country
chart_template_country -> Chart Template Country
chart_template -> Fiscal Localization Package

[Currencies]
currency -> Main Currency
group_multi_currency -> Multi-Currency
module_currency_rate_live -> Automatic Exchange Rates

[Taxes]
default_sales_tax or sale_tax -> Sales Tax
default_purchase_tax or purchase_tax -> Purchase Tax
account_price_include -> Prices (Tax Included/Excluded)
tax_return_periodicity -> Tax Return Periodicity
tax_return_reminder_days -> Reminder Days
tax_return_journal -> Tax Return Journal
tax_rounding_method or tax_calculation_rounding_method -> Rounding Method
module_l10n_eu_oss -> EU Intra-community Distance Selling
group_cash_rounding -> Cash Rounding
tax_exigibility -> Cash Basis

[Invoicing]
default_sale_payment_term -> Default Customer Payment Term
default_purchase_payment_term -> Default Vendor Payment Term
fiscalyear_last_day -> Fiscal Year Last Day
fiscalyear_last_month -> Fiscal Year Last Month

[Payments / Vendor]
module_account_payment -> Online Payments
module_account_batch_payment -> Batch Payments
module_account_check_printing -> Checks
module_account_extract -> OCR Digitization

[Accounting / Analytics]
module_account_reports -> Dynamic Reports
group_analytic_accounting -> Analytic Accounting
module_account_budget -> Budgets
module_product_margin -> Product Margin Analysis

[PEPPOL]
is_account_peppol_eligible -> PEPPOL Eligibility
module_account_peppol -> Enable PEPPOL

[Extra toggles]
use_anglo_saxon -> Anglo-Saxon Accounting
followup_enabled -> Follow-up Levels
multi_ledger_enabled -> Multi-Ledger
budgets_enabled -> Financial Budgets
assets_enabled -> Asset Models
online_payments_enabled -> Online Payments Switch

body.raw:
{
  "company": {{company_id}},
  "country_code": "US",
  "fiscal_localization_country": {{country_id}},
  "account_fiscal_country": {{country_id}},
  "chart_template_country": {{country_id}},
  "chart_template": "generic_us",
  "currency": {{currency_id}},
  "group_multi_currency": true,
  "module_currency_rate_live": false,
  "default_sales_tax": {{tax_id}},
  "default_purchase_tax": {{tax_id}},
  "sale_tax": {{tax_id}},
  "purchase_tax": {{tax_id}},
  "tax_return_periodicity": "monthly",
  "tax_return_reminder_days": 7,
  "tax_return_journal": {{journal_id}},
  "tax_rounding_method": "round_per_line",
  "tax_calculation_rounding_method": "round_per_line",
  "account_price_include": "tax_excluded",
  "default_sale_payment_term": {{payment_term_id}},
  "default_purchase_payment_term": {{payment_term_id}},
  "fiscalyear_last_day": 31,
  "fiscalyear_last_month": "12",
  "module_l10n_eu_oss": false,
  "group_cash_rounding": false,
  "module_account_payment": true,
  "module_account_batch_payment": false,
  "module_account_check_printing": false,
  "module_account_extract": false,
  "module_account_reports": true,
  "group_analytic_accounting": true,
  "module_account_budget": false,
  "module_product_margin": false,
  "is_account_peppol_eligible": false,
  "module_account_peppol": false,
  "use_anglo_saxon": false,
  "followup_enabled": true,
  "multi_ledger_enabled": false,
  "budgets_enabled": false,
  "assets_enabled": false,
  "online_payments_enabled": false
}

item.name: Update Accounting Settings
item.description: Same UI mapping as Create Accounting Settings. Keep payload JSON valid (no inline # comments in request body).

body.raw:
{
  "company": {{company_id}},
  "country_code": "US",
  "fiscal_localization_country": {{country_id}},
  "account_fiscal_country": {{country_id}},
  "chart_template_country": {{country_id}},
  "chart_template": "generic_us",
  "currency": {{currency_id}},
  "group_multi_currency": true,
  "default_sales_tax": {{tax_id}},
  "default_purchase_tax": {{tax_id}},
  "tax_return_periodicity": "quarterly",
  "tax_return_reminder_days": 10,
  "tax_return_journal": {{journal_id}},
  "tax_rounding_method": "round_globally",
  "tax_calculation_rounding_method": "round_globally",
  "account_price_include": "tax_excluded",
  "default_sale_payment_term": {{payment_term_id}},
  "default_purchase_payment_term": {{payment_term_id}},
  "fiscalyear_last_day": 31,
  "fiscalyear_last_month": "12",
  "module_account_payment": true,
  "module_account_reports": true,
  "group_analytic_accounting": true,
  "multi_ledger_enabled": true,
  "budgets_enabled": true,
  "assets_enabled": true,
  "online_payments_enabled": true
}

item.name: Upsert Settings by Company
item.description: Create if company settings do not exist; otherwise update. Same UI mapping as Create request.
